body_html:
Hi @zasdfgbnm ,
I was thinking specificity_at_sensitivity but you're right that's not what you're looking for.
I understand your example. But in reality things are not that simple. For example you can look at the implementation of any *_at_threshold which is not that simple. IMHO, providing common metrics as functions helps many users to have metrics in a clean way.

body:
Hi @zasdfgbnm ,
I was thinking `specificity_at_sensitivity` but you're right that's not what you're looking for.
I understand your example. But in reality things are not that simple. For example you can look at the implementation of any *_at_threshold which is not that simple. IMHO, providing common metrics as functions helps many users to have metrics in a clean way.
